The leader in human-centric cybersecurity

87 of the Fortune 100 trust Proofpoint to stop human-targeted attacks, safeguard their data and make their people more resilient.

Get In Touch

The Challenge

Today’s integrated cyber attacks target people, not just technology

Digital transformation has redefined the traditional perimeters. The systems designed to safeguard people remain fragmented and inadequate. To stop multi-layered attacks targeting your users, you need a multi-layered human-centric cybersecurity platform.

1%

of data breaches rely on exploiting the human element

of cybersecurity issues can be traced to human error

Why Proofpoint

Half a million customers, including 87 of the Fortune 100, trust Proofpoint.

Proofpoint’s human-centric security platform is the only modern security architecture that takes a comprehensive, adaptive, and effective approach to protect your organization’s greatest assets and biggest risks: your people.

We’ve identified the three critical human risks impacting organizations— human-targeted threats, data loss and human error—and tailored our integrated solutions to combat them all.

Protect People

Mitigate Human Risk

Defend Data

Nexus AI Threat Intelligence

Products Protect People

Protect People

Our multi-layered threat defense stops human-targeted attacks—including 99.99% of all email threats—prevent impersonation and mitigates supplier risk.

Products Defend Data

Defend Data

Our proactive information protection analyzes user behavior and content across all channels to defend data from careless, malicious and compromised users.

Products Mitigate Human Risk

Mitigate Human Risk

Our intelligent human risk protection provides invaluable insights into vulnerable, privileged, and targeted individuals within the organization, pinpointing those most likely to be compromised. We enable organizations to apply their strongest controls and tailor security awareness education based on human risk.

HOW WE DO IT Nexus AI

Nexus AI

Our Nexus AI technology gives our customers unmatched protection from the full spectrum of human risks.

Our Nexus AI models are powered by access to best-in-class data from protecting more than 500K customers. Our understanding of risks is not only wide but deep—we analyze 22 trillion potential payloads annually to extract intelligence.

Our models are enhanced, and continuously improved, by contextual insights and in-depth classification from our leading team of threat researchers and data scientists.
